    level="1"

    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quick Spring](/Feats.aspx?ID=4151) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 81 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Acrobat](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=236)

**Prerequisites**
[Acrobat Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1873); Master in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1)

**Access**
Members of the Firebrands at the rank of second mark or higher have access to this feat.

</column>

---

Ishii Bunji is a skilled tumbler, and learning his technique allows you to push yourself off a foe and propel yourself across the battlefield faster. If you succeed at an Acrobatics check to [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=29) an enemy's space, you can Stride again as a free action after you complete your current movement.
